SELECT * FROM CARPOOL_BORDER c JOIN MEMBERS m ON m.id=c.id WHERE cp_no=#{cp_no}

mapper.select: SELECT m.*,c.*,r.id as reservationID,r.finish,r.score FROM MEMBERS m JOIN CARPOOL_BORDER c ON m.id=c.id JOIN reservation r ON r.cp_no = c.cp_no
mapper.update: UPDATE RESERVATION set finish=1 where cp_no =#{cp_no}
mapper.select: SELECT c.cp_no, opened, signed, done, r.title as title,r.content as content, reviewed FROM carpool_border c JOIN reservation r ON c.cp_no = r.cp_no WHERE c.cp_no = #{cp_no}
